meanings.sent1: During the game, the players on the opposing team outnumbered us.
meanings.sent2: The students outnumbered the teachers in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: At the pizza party, the slices of pepperoni pizza outnumbered the cheese slices.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky easily outnumbered the grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The ants in the anthill outnumbered all the other insects in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The colorful balloons outnumbered the plain ones at the party.
meanings.sent2: In the forest, the trees outnumbered the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The number of books on the shelf outnumbered the available space.
meanings.sent4: The amount of raindrops in the storm outnumbered the leaves on the trees.
meanings.sent5: The toys in the playroom outnumbered the children playing with them.
